mapper.insert: insert into jaiko_inventory_info (prd_cd, brand_nm, prd_nm, jan_cd, now_prd_cnt, exp_dt) select prd_cd, brand_nm, prd_nm, jan_cd, prd_cnt, STR_TO_DATE('9999/12/31','%Y/%m/%d') from jaiko_prd_info where jan_cd = #{jan_cd}
mapper.select: select jpi.jan_cd , jpi.prd_nm , jpi.std_info , jpi.prd_unit_prc , jii.prd_qty , jii.prd_case , jii.prd_bara , date_format(jii.exp_dt, '%Y/%m/%d') exp_dt , jii.sell_prc from jaiko_prd_info jpi inner join jaiko_inventory_info jii on jii.jan_cd = jpi.jan_cd
